title: SOC Automation with eBPF
subtitle: Custom probes for detection and response
learning_objectives: Identify detection gaps addressed by eBPF
Integrate eBPF telemetry into SOC tooling

content_blocks.title: Prime Your Approach

content.text: Enter this lesson ready to balance design discipline with creative problem solving.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Plan carefully, test thoroughly, and iterate often.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Security leaders rely on this mindset for durable improvements.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: Which detection gap would eBPF close for your SOC?

content_blocks.title: Guiding Framework

content.text:
### EBPF
- **E**xplore telemetry gaps
- **B**uild safe probes
- **P**rocess events
- **F**eedback into detections

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Keep the mnemonic close to stay oriented as complexity grows.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Frameworks anchor busy teams navigating change.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: Which step of the framework will require the most collaboration?

content_blocks.title: eBPF for Security Observability

content.resources:
Watch the expert session to reinforce these concepts.

Kernel engineering teams explain building eBPF instrumentation for security.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Visual learning accelerates retention—take notes as you watch.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Conference talks reveal hard-won lessons from practitioners.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: Which tactic from the video will you pilot?

content_blocks.title: Field Example

content.text: A fintech SOC detected credential theft by deploying eBPF probes that triggered automated SOAR containment workflows.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: See how peers translated theory into results.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Sourced from public case studies and practitioner talks.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What metric will prove success in your environment?

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Define a missing detection signal.
2. Prototype an eBPF probe capturing that event.
3. Forward data to the SIEM and SOAR.
4. Evaluate performance and adjust.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Rehearse changes in a controlled setting to surface gaps early.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Tabletop and lab drills are standard before production rollouts.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What support do you need to complete this simulation?

content_blocks.title: Teach Back

content.text:
### Teach Back
- Explain the framework to a teammate.
- List two next actions and deadlines.
- Schedule a review meeting to assess progress.

content_blocks.real_world_connection: High-performing teams embed teach-backs into their cadence.
